The Limited Macroeconomic Effects of Unemployment Benefit Extensions Online Appendix Gabriel Chodorow-Reich Loukas Karabarbounis April 2016 A Data Appendix In this data appendix we describe the extended benefits programs and the BLS methodology to estimate the state unemployment rates. A.1 Extended Benefits and Emergency Compensation Programs In Table A.1 we list the full set of benefit extension programs, tiers, and triggers in operation during our sample.
